section.heading: Inspector of Gas and Meters to transfer books to Commission.
section.text: The Inspector of Gas and Meters provided for by law prior to March 4, 1913, shall transfer and deliver to the Commission all books, maps, papers, records, apparatus, and the property of whatsoever description in his possession, and said Commission is authorized to take possession of all books, maps, papers, records, apparatus, and property of whatsoever description.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of : § 7 of D.C. Act 24-125 provided that the creation of subsections (b) and (c) of § 34-131 this section by § 3(k) of D.C. Act 24-125 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

For temporary (90 days) creation of Chapter 3A of this title, see § 3(k) of Public Emergency Extension and Eviction and Utility Moratorium Phasing Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-125, July 24, 2021, 68 DCR 007342).

Applicability of D.C. Law 24-39: § 7 of D.C. Law 24-39 provided that the creation of subsections (b) and (c) of § 34-131 this section by § 3(k) of D.C. Law 24-39 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

For temporary (225 days) creation of Chapter 3A of this title, see § 3(k) of Public Emergency Extension and Eviction and Utility Moratorium Phasing Temporary Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Law 24-39, Oct. 27, 2021, 68 DCR 009487).
